abstracts.cdata!:
The Tianhuangping Hydroelectric Project
            will utilize the remaining loan to construct Sijing and
            Hangdong 500kV Substations located at suburban of Shanghai
            and Hangzhou, in Zhejiang Province. During construction and
            operation, to mitigate the effect of noise pollution, low
            noise machines should be used and high noise facilities must
            not be utilized at night. Main operating equipment should
            meet sound requirements to reduce impact of noise. A closed
            insulation screen will be installed and trees and flowers
            will be planted to absorb noise. Dust will be reduced by
            spraying water to earth piled up, or covering it with
            fabric. Wastewater sewage will be treated with precipitating
            tank and used in irrigation. Some trees will be cut down for
            building substations, entrance, and exit roads. They will be
            planted in other spots to balance the ecological
            environment. To maintain agricultural ecology, destroyed
            vegetation will be recovered immediately after construction.
